doc:
Matthew Macfadyen https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Matthew_Macfadyen 0 David Matthew Macfadyen (born 17 October 1974) is an English actor. He played MI5 Intelligence Officer Tom Quinn in the BBC television drama series Spooks, Mr. Darcy in the 2005 film of Pride Prejudice and Daniel in the Frank Oz comedy Death at a Funeral. He also portrayed John Birt in the political drama Frost/Nixon, and Detective Inspector Edmund Reid in the BBC series Ripper Street. In 2015 he starred in the Sky Living series The Enfield Haunting as Guy Lyon Playfair. In June 2010, Macfadyen won a British Academy Television Award for Best Supporting Actor for his work in Criminal Justice. David_Matthew_Macfadyen ( born 17_October_1974 ) is an_English_actor . He played MI5_Intelligence_Officer_Tom_Quinn in the_BBC_television_drama_series_Spooks , Mr._Darcy in the_2005_film of Pride_ and Daniel in the_Frank_Oz_comedy_Death at a_Funeral . He also portrayed John_Birt in the_political_drama_Frost/Nixon , and Detective_Inspector_Edmund_Reid in the_BBC_series_Ripper_Street . In 2015 he starred in the_Sky_Living_series The_Enfield_Haunting as Guy_Lyon_Playfair . In June_2010 , Macfadyen won a_British_Academy_Television_Award for Best Supporting_Actor for his_work in Criminal_Justice .
